briefTitle: Study of Aspirin and Exemestane as Adjuvant Treatment in Breast Cancer
officialTitle: Phase 2 Study of Aspirin Plus Exemestane Comparing With Exemestane Alone in the Adjuvant Treatment of Postmenopausal Breast Cancer
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Breast cancer after surgery postmenopausal

Exclusion Criteria:

* contraindication of aspirin
